tool_description:
< Payments made easy />

* Secure REST API
* Full integration with your website
* Simple pricing
* Accept multiple currencies
* Fast and local support
* Fast account activation
name: PAYMILL GmbH
title: PAYMILL GmbH

api_list.name: subscription details
list clients
transaction details
api_list.description: To receive the details of an existing transaction, call the unique transaction ID. You can find the ID in the response of the previous request. The return is a refund object with the information of the used payment, client and transaction attributes.

api_list.name: list offers
api_list.description: This function returns a JSON object with a list of offers. In which order this list are returned depends on the optional parameter order. The following parameters can be used:

api_list.name: list transactions
api_list.description: This function returns a JSON object with a list of transactions. In which order this list is returned depends on the optional parameter order:  count ,offset, created_at
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://paymill.p.rapidapi.com/transactions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "paymill.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: client details

api_list.description: Returns a list of all payment objects.
